name: Orchestra Western Dance
description: Orchestra Western Dance is a vibrant and energetic performance art that beautifully blends the grandeur of orchestral music with the expressive, dynamic flair of Western dance styles. It is a captivating spectacle where rhythm meets movement, creating a harmonious dialogue between musicians and dancers on stage.

name: Lpu Cooking Champs
description: LPU has hosted significant culinary competitions, such as the National Culinary Challenge Season 6 semi-finals, which celebrated India's diverse flavors. These events provide a platform for students to showcase their skills, gain exposure, and compete at national levels.

name: Music
description: It's a new event based on the new artist.
